body.name: Playtex Drop-Ins 8 oz Liners, 100 ct
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

body.description: Playtex Drop-Ins 100 Ct Liner 8 Oz. More Natural Breathing - Clinically Proven - Pre-Sterilized Liner Gently Collapses Like Mom's Breast As Baby Feeds.. Air-Free Feeding To Help Reduce Colic - Unique Anti-Colic Liner Gently Collapses As Baby Feeds, Preventing Air Bubbles From Mixing With Milk. Less Air Bubbles Means Less Gas, Colic And Discomfort. Mimics Natural Breastfeeding By Simulating Same Suck, Swallow And Breathe Patterns As Breastfeeding, So Baby Breathes More Naturally During Feeding.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #12,250 in Baby (See Top 100 in Baby) #296 in Baby Bottles

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I was introduced to these with my first son by a pediatric GI, we literally tried every colic bottle and I spent so much money and when it came down to it, this was the answer to my prayers. Very little clean up really it might seem crazy to have to buy liners to some but I think a colic bottle with 17000 different parts or having to constantly sterilize all these different bottle. Super easy on the go!! And you buy them in month supplies very accurate!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice to use
reviews.reviewText: Use it toss it. Always a clean bottle .Great to know your baby has the cleanest bottle possible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Never had a problem.
reviews.reviewText: I've never had a problem with these.I did accidentally pop a hole in one BUT the instructions CLEARLY warns against using sharp objects to push liners and I CLEARLY ignored the warning. That was my fault 100% that being said.The liners eliminate a few steps in bottle preparation.Dont have to wash the bottle as often. The liners are sterilized and always clean if u take care of them. It's not difficult to close the box.Makes warming the milk faster because the [barrier] between hot water and milk is so thin, it allows for fast warming.Dont let the thinnest of the bag worry youm they dont break super easily while using them properly.Not sure the best way to travel with these? I put a few in a ziplock baggie and they dont take up much space so I guess maybe not so bad for traveling. Maybe actually best for traveling. Rather than having multiple bottles you have to wash. Just one bottle and 2-4 nipples. 100 liners takes the space of 2 or 3 bottles. You don't usually need 100. You need less than 10/ day in this size. The 4oz ones even take less space. So in the end the liners are a win in my book!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bottle liners for Playtex Bottles
reviews.reviewText: I have a 19 month old, using these from birth. I cannot change now with only a few months left for using a bottle. I am happy with product. Cost is crazy high !!!@I cannot figure out why all of a sudden there are none to purchase in local stores and Amazon price is crazy high. I bought 100 I hope they last me for the next few months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2016
reviews.reviewText: I used these when my daughter was born. They have changed a little bit in looks but not by function. She decided to get these for the twins when they are born. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Used for Vacation Travel
reviews.reviewText: I didn't want to sterilize bottles while on vacation so I thought to try out this bottle system. The bottles are too large around for my liking. For sure, the drop-ins did the trick though. All in all, I would use them if you're on the go (traveling) and want to pack lightly in your carry-on. I took about two-three nipples with rings, one bottle and a ton of drop-ins. The plan worked. No mess, no sterilizing. Easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's the best design to simulate breastfeeding
reviews.reviewText: I've been using these liners for a few months now. My baby girl just turned one. I wish I started using them at the very beginning. With these, my baby can drink 8 oz of formula without pausing to let air back into the bottle, or to catch her breath. It's the best design to simulate breastfeeding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect. I used to use regular bottles
reviews.reviewText: Perfect. I used to use regular bottles, but was tired of all the bottle washing. They fit perfectly and are very convenient. I'm sorry I didn't discover these sooner!

I’ve used this product before and no complaints. However this latest batch had a bunch of bags with holes which led to wasted milk, which as any parent knows can be a big issue. Hope the manufacturer does better quality testing and fixes this problem.

I've had so many faulty liners this purchase that I now have to check before use. I'm unable to pump very much so what I do have is precious, making it very upsetting when I lose so much due to holes.
